/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, filled with cars and buses, weaves its way through the heart of the city. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds. The sun casts a warm, inviting light over the scene, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the movement of the vehicles. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the rhythm and energy of the city.
